policy: Azure App Service Web app doesn't require Client Certs
description: Client certificates allow for the app to request a certificate for incoming requests. Only clients that have a valid certificate will be able to reach the app.

recommendation.name: Recommended solution for making sure App Service Web app requires Client Certs.
recommendation.description: It is recommended that Azure App Service Web app requires Client Certs. Please make sure your template has "client_cert_enabled" and it is set to true.
